instructions.instruction: Government-issued photo identification and a credit card, debit card, or cash deposit may be required at check-in for incidental charges

checkin.special_instructions: This property offers transfers from the airport. To arrange pick-up, guests must contact the property 24 hours prior to arrival, using the contact information on the booking confirmation. Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival at the property.

data.description:
Historic Location Inside Avignon Ramparts
Located inside the historic ramparts of Avignon, Hôtel Le Bristol offers a unique and authentic stay in the heart of the city. Just steps away from the bustling center, guests can immerse themselves in the rich history and culture of Avignon.

Comfortable Rooms and Convenient Amenities
The air-conditioned rooms at Hôtel Le Bristol are thoughtfully equipped with modern amenities including a desk, flat-screen TV, and a private bathroom. The 24-hour front desk and concierge service ensure that guests have a comfortable and hassle-free stay.

Delightful Dining Experience
Start your day right with a delicious buffet breakfast offered at Hôtel Le Bristol. Whether you prefer a light meal or a hearty feast, the breakfast spread caters to all tastes and sets the tone for a wonderful day of exploring Avignon.

Book your stay at Hôtel Le Bristol and experience the charm of Avignon from within its historic walls.

**Historic Location Inside Avignon Ramparts**
Located inside the historic ramparts of Avignon, Hôtel Le Bristol offers a unique and authentic stay in the heart of the city. Just steps away from the bustling center, guests can immerse themselves in the rich history and culture of Avignon.

**Comfortable Rooms and Convenient Amenities**
The air-conditioned rooms at Hôtel Le Bristol are thoughtfully equipped with modern amenities including a desk, flat-screen TV, and a private bathroom. The 24-hour front desk and concierge service ensure that guests have a comfortable and hassle-free stay.

**Delightful Dining Experience**
Start your day right with a delicious buffet breakfast offered at Hôtel Le Bristol. Whether you prefer a light meal or a hearty feast, the breakfast spread caters to all tastes and sets the tone for a wonderful day of exploring Avignon.

data.important_info:
Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property is taking steps to help protect the safety of guests and staff. Certain services and amenities may be reduced or unavailable as a result.
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), wearing a face mask is mandatory in all indoor common areas.

	When booking [5] rooms or more, different policies and additional supplements may apply.

facilities.name: Staff adhere to local safety protocols
Cleaning standards that are effective against Coronavirus
Hand sanitizer in guest room and key areas
Guests can opt-out any cleaning services during stay
Shared stationery like menus, pens are removed
Property cleaned by professional cleaning companies
Screens / Barriers between staff and guests for safety

policies.name: Groups
policies.description: When booking more than 4 rooms, different policies and additional supplements may apply.

policies.name: Internet
policies.description: WiFi is available in all areas and is free of charge.

policies.name: Pets
policies.description: Pets are allowed. Charges may be applicable.

policies.name: Children and extra bed policy
policies.description:
Children of any age are allowed.
Children up to and including 2 years old stay for free when using an available cot.
You haven't added any extra beds.
Any type of extra bed or child's cot/crib is upon request and needs to be confirmed by management.

rooms.description: The family room provides a safe deposit box, a sofa, as well as a private bathroom featuring a bath or a shower and a hairdryer. This family room is air-conditioned and features a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, soundproof walls, a minibar and a wardrobe. The unit offers 3 beds.

rooms.description: The quadruple room features air conditioning, soundproof walls, as well as a private bathroom boasting a bath or a shower and a hairdryer. The quadruple room provides a wardrobe, a safe deposit box, parquet floors, heating, as well as a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The unit has 3 beds.
